sourcesContent:
import './recipePage.css'

const RecipePage = () => {

    return <body>


mixin svg(name)
  svg.icon(class=name)
    use(xlink:href=`https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/134/134105.svg#${name}`)
    
//- Today's Featured Recipe
.ft-recipe 
    .ft-recipe__thumb
        span(id="close-modal")
            i.ion.ion-md-close
        h3 Today's Featured Recipe
        img(src="https://zippypaws.com/app/uploads/2018/05/strawberry-waffles-1024x668.jpg", alt="Strawberry Waffle")
    .ft-recipe__content
        header.content__header
            .row-wrapper
                h2(class="recipe-title") Strawberry Waffle
                .user-rating
            ul.recipe-details
                li.recipe-details-item.time
                    i.ion.ion-ios-clock-outline
                    span.value 20
                    span.title Minutes
                li.recipe-details-item.ingredients
                    i.ion.ion-ios-book-outline
                    span.value 5
                    span.title Ingredients
                li.recipe-details-item.servings
                    i.ion.ion-ios-person-outline
                    span.value 4-6
                    span.title Serving
        p.description 
            | Thereâ€™s no better way to celebrate May being National Strawberry Month than by sharing a sweet treat with your pup!!! Strawberries...
        footer.content__footer
            a(href="#") View Recipe
    </body>
}
export default RecipePage
